content:
799 82% of Virginia Democrat voters knew about Jay Jones's texts. We are officially at war. posted 6 days ago by PatriotSam 32 comments award share report block Red Eagle Politics @RedEaglePatriot • 7d 82% of Virginians, and close to 80% of his own voters, knew about the Jay Jones texts, per the exit polling. He outperformed Kamala Harris anyways, winning "moderates" by 24 points and "independents" by 7. Against an inoffensive incumbent, no less.
32 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Around the Web 1 Simple Hack to Cut Your Electric Bill (Try Tonight) GadgetCyno TheJakeFroggy 40 points 6 days ago I have no respect for Democrat voters at this point. Honestly I think every single Democrat voter deserves to be arrested. permalink award report block reply PatriotSam OP 28 points 6 days ago I've had to cut a lot of people out of my life ever since Charlie Kirk, I'm just not going to take it anymore. IQ 100 "Jamal just had a rough childhood we should cut him some slack." IQ 125 "It is evident that those of African descent cannot exist peacefully in a developed society." permalink parent award report block reply TD_Covfefe_Crusader 5 points 6 days ago They want us dead and they don't even bother pretending otherwise. permalink parent award report block reply Smurfection 2 points 6 days ago I never have.  They're either stupid or evil.  No one votes democrat because they really care about anything.  They just like pretending they do. permalink parent award report block reply turdinthepunch 19 points 6 days ago Turns out, killing Republicans energizes Democrats. Wild. permalink award report block reply TD_Covfefe_Crusader 7 points 6 days ago It's essentially part of their platform now. permalink parent award report block reply rootGoose 2 points 6 days ago It emboldens them to do the same. permalink parent award report block reply Roadpower 15 points 6 days ago And considering all of the physical violence it isn't a cold war either. permalink award report block reply TD_Covfefe_Crusader 9 points 6 days ago It hasn't really heated up yet though, because only one side is doing the violence. Based on history, it will soon escalate into isolated skirmishes. permalink parent award report block reply PapaPepe 15 points 6 days ago They want us dead too permalink award report block reply _Sully_ 3 points 6 days ago But also a very low voter turn out. If you're gonna just look at percentage differences like that then you're tricking yourself. If 80% of the people voted in last year's election then only 20% voted in this one that 24 points is really 6 points and even then you have to consider percentages of party line voting as well. In reality the biggest lesson here is that republicans aren't voting and are likely disillusioned. And of course they are Democrats have the mind melting machine at 11. permalink award report block reply BusterHyman99 3 points 6 days ago I'm not sure because I remember seeing stuff that mainstream media wasn't even reporting on it. So which is it? Who knows. I think Democrats are just plain and simply evil. Not at overthrowing Trump, but registering voters. permalink award report block reply BlackJack1776 2 points 6 days ago Maybe next time, don't run someone who shit talks Trump? GOPe doesn't run this party anymore. It's Trump's party.
